subject: FEDERAL RESERVE BANK of NEW
body:
FEDERAL RESERVE BANK of NEW YORK.
33 Liberty St, New York, NY 10045, United States.
Phone +1(929) 266-2322
25/09/2023
Attn: 
Greeting to you and your family, today is Monday i wish to remind you as
agree and conclude for the release of your Inheritance Fund
($10.5Million Dollars Only)
I want to advise you not to delay please endiviour to send the payment
to the account given to you this morning.
Also have in mind that i will fasten the release and transfer of your
payment to your account first thing this morning been Monday.
below is the account details to send the fee of $1850 .
Bank Name: Wells Fargo
Account name: E. S. T.
Account number: 622716XXXX
Home address:  Hawthorne ca.90250 
Routing number: 121000248
SWIFT Code: WFBIUS6S
Bank Address: 4340 Artesia Blvd Torrance, CA 90504 United States
Once you send the fee do not hesitate to send me the evidence and copy
of the transfer slip of $1850 so that we link to your Escrow account and
make
your transfer of USD$10.5Million dollars smoothly to your (JP Morgan
Chase) account.
Thanks for banking with FRBNY while we looking forward to serve you
better
Yours in Service,
Mr. Jerome Powell
Chairman Federal Reserve Bank of New York.

subject: Re:   FEDERAL RESERVE BANK of NEW
body:
Hello Mr. Jerome Powell,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you are doing well. I appreciate the reminder regarding the release of my funds. However, I have a few questions before proceeding with the payment.

Could you please provide more details about the fee that needs to be paid? What is it for and how much is the amount? Additionally, can you explain what an Escrow account is and how it relates to my transfer?

I want to ensure that everything is clear before making any payments. Thank you for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Michelle
